name: Forgotten King (crimsonscholar)
description:
You are a King who suffers from Dementia. As you progress through game, you start to connect pieces and claim the throne from your notorious brother!

This is my first game as a developer!

An Action/Platformer game that is on the development stage. This is only chapter 1 but more will come.

Story, shop, powerups, original soundtracks, chapters, bosses, enemies and much more are yet to come by time.

Currently working on second forest/jungle themed chapter.

I want to develop this game with your suggestions!
